mapper.select: select * from user where user_name=#{str} or user_email=#{str} and user_status > 0 limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into user (user_name, user_pass, user_nickname, user_email, user_url, user_avatar, user_last_login_ip, user_register_time, user_last_login_time, user_status,user_photo) values (#{userName}, #{userPass}, #{userNickname}, #{userEmail}, #{userUrl}, #{userAvatar}, #{userLastLoginIp}, #{userRegisterTime}, #{userLastLoginTime}, #{userStatus},#{userPhoto})
mapper.select: select count(*) from article where article_user_id=#{userId}
mapper.update: update user set user_name=#{userName},user_nickname=#{userNickname},user_email=#{userEmail}, user_url=#{userUrl} where user_id=#{userId}
